ygData.subject: Karanas
ygData.msgSnippet: Just a quick question for  all necros who know the Karana s (info on the karana server specifically would also be great).  Can a level 16 necro with a level 16
ygData.messageBody:
Just a quick question for all necros who know the Karana's (info on the
karana server specifically would also be great). Can a level 16 necro
with a level 16 Druid hunt there, and what should we hunt for each
section of levels .. 16 -20, 20 - 24, 24 - 28. I'm interested in power
leveling to 25 or so then heading to unrest to get savant cap and bs
gloves. (and practicing my charm undead). I realize this has been
posted here often but my necro has been a secondary character until last
night when I got tired of heal med heal med die. (Clerics are useless
once a mob attacks them.)
Thanks

Slortar,
Karana
